Title: Hibernation
Description:
Posidriss's companion has been helping them with their severe insomnia, but I worry that they are still falling behind other whelps in their connection to the Dream.

Perhaps we can aid them through a pet battle! Green dragons often protect the Dream from the Nightmare, and Wurallie has found the perfect critter for them to practice this on.

It is mostly harmless.
ObjectivesText: Help Posidriss defeat the Nightmare critter.
RewardText:
Posidriss was certainly enthusiastic about facing the enemies of the Emerald Dream. I think they learned a lesson as well.

Posidriss will want to join you on some of your future adventures, though you may have to keep them from rushing after the big threats.

Objectives.Text: Visit Wurallie in the Waking Shores
Defeat Wurallie in a Pet Battle with Somnius on your team
